metadata.Title: CVE-2021-21372 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description: Nimble is a package manager for the Nim programming language. In Nimrelease version before versions 1.2.10 and 1.4.4, Nimble doCmd is used indifferent places and can be leveraged to execute arbitrary commands. Anattacker can craft a malicious entry in the packages.json package list totrigger code execution.

criterions.comment: nim package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
